org.mfg.mya

Class Printer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mfg.mya.Printer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Printer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable

    Helper class you can use in the MyA templates to generate the text to files or any other output stream.

    To use this class in a template, you can change the default "print()" method by "printer.print()", something like this: 

     #mya:print printer.print(@)
 //printer = new Printer(output);
 Hello world!

    The main feature of this class is the userText(String, String, String) method. With it you can preserve some code in the replacing file, making it easy to customize the generated text.

    Author:
    arian

        public void print(java.lang.String str)
           throws java.io.IOException

      • userText

        public void userText(java.lang.String openTag,
                     java.lang.String closeTag,
                     java.lang.String defaultText)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Use this method to preserve certain code in the replacing text. All text between the tags "openTag" and "closeTag" wil be kept intact. If those tags do not exist, then the default text is printed.
        Parameters:
        openTag - Open tag.
        closeTag - Close tag.
        defaultText - Default content if there is not any open-close tag.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is any error.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the emitter. This flush/close the internal writer.
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - I/O error.
